overview: Honorable Mention: Experimental Forum  A film that explores mental health, our mental states; how we are thrown into chaos.  A film that considers that mystical, magical energy that flows; unseen, charging into the Nether-Realm.
tagline: Phantasmagorical,  Cult,  Mystical,  Magical,  Entities,  Celestial,  Dark,  Find light,  Mental states,
title: Moonlight of the Shadow
